Scripts.OnLeave: if not self:IsMouseOver() then UIFrameFadeOut(self.Border, 0.25, self.Border:GetAlpha(), 0) end
if (self.IsOn) or self:IsMouseOver(-4, 4, 0, 0) then return; end;
if self:IsMouseOver() then return end UIFrameFadeOut(self:GetParent(), 0.2, self:GetParent():GetAlpha(), 0)

Scripts.OnLoad: self.r, self.g, self.b = 0, 71/255, 187/255; self.Color:SetColorTexture(self.r, self.g, self.b);
